abandonMatch.messageRunning: You have an active match in progress. All match data, player statistics, and game history will be permanently lost if you start a new game.
abandonMatch.messageNotRunning: This will reset your current session and take you back to the configuration screen.

matchRecovery.title: Save Match?
matchRecovery.subtitle: Found a finished match that wasn't saved
matchRecovery.explanation: This match was completed but not saved to your match history. You can either save it now to preserve the statistics, or delete it permanently.
matchRecovery.tip: Saving to history preserves player statistics and performance data

pendingMatchResume.title: Resume Match Setup
pendingMatchResume.noPendingDescription: You don't have any saved match configurations.
pendingMatchResume.tip: Resume Setup takes you to the Configuration Screen where you can review and modify settings

addPlayer.title: Add Player
addPlayer.message: Choose how you'd like to add a player.

addTemporaryPlayer.title: Add Temporary Player
addTemporaryPlayer.description: This player will only appear in the current match and won't be added to the team roster.

goalScorer.title: Who Scored?
goalScorer.readOnlyNotice: This goal information is read-only. Use the correction mode to make changes.

fieldPlayer.title: Field Player Options
fieldPlayer.message: What would you like to do with {{playerName}}?
fieldPlayer.selectPositionSwitch: Select which player to switch positions with {{playerName}}:
fieldPlayer.removeFromNext: Remove from next to go off
fieldPlayer.tooltipCannotModify: All substitutes are inactive - cannot modify rotation
fieldPlayer.tooltipCannotSetNext: All substitutes are inactive - cannot set as next
fieldPlayer.tooltipCannotSubstitute: All substitutes are inactive - cannot substitute

substitute.title: Substitute Options
substitute.message: What would you like to do with {{playerName}}?
substitute.selectNextPosition: Select which position {{playerName}} should take when coming in:

goalie.title: Replace Goalie
goalie.message: Select a new goalie to replace {{goalieName}}:

substituteSelection.title: Select Substitute
substituteSelection.message: Select which substitute to bring on for {{fieldPlayerName}}:

preferences.title: Preferences
preferences.enableAudioDescription: Play sound when substitution timer reaches alert time
preferences.audioNote: Audio alerts work alongside vibration alerts. If your browser blocks audio playback, only vibration will be used. The alert timing is configured in the game setup screen.

featureVote.featureDescription: The "{{featureName}}" formation is not yet implemented. You can vote for it to be prioritized.

endPeriodEarly.title: End Period Early?
endPeriodEarly.message: There are still {{timeString}} remaining in this period. Are you sure you want to end the period early?

signOutDuringMatch.title: Sign Out During Active Match?
signOutDuringMatch.message: You have a match currently running. Signing out now may stop tracking this match. Are you sure you want to sign out?

newGame.title: Start a new game?
newGame.message: Are you sure you want to start a new game? This will reset all progress and take you back to the configuration screen.
